aiSummaryReviews.text:
In an era where digital businesses can sometimes feel untouchable, Trustpilot is a breath of fresh air. It provides a vital platform for transparency, allowing consumers to hold businesses accountable for their actions.

I especially appreciate how it empowers users to warn the community about shady businesses and predatory practices that should be avoided at all costs. It’s more than just a review site; it’s a necessary check-and-balance system that helps protect people’s hard-earned money and ensures that the truth about a company’s operational failures can’t be swept under the rug. Essential for anyone who values honesty in the marketplace.
aiSummaryReviews.title: The ultimate tool for corporate accountability and consumer safety.

aiSummaryReviews.text:
I’ve had a really positive experience using this review platform. It’s easy to navigate, and everything is laid out clearly, which makes finding detailed information about different games simple and enjoyable.

What I really appreciate is how well the platform covers gameplay. The reviews give honest insights into how games actually feel to play, highlighting important features, performance, and overall entertainment value. It helps set realistic expectations before trying something new.

The game selection covered on the platform is also impressive. There’s a wide range of titles reviewed, from popular mainstream games to hidden gems. It feels comprehensive and up to date, which makes it a reliable source for discovering new options.

Customer support is another strong point. Whenever I had a question, the response was quick, friendly, and helpful. It’s clear that they care about their users and want to provide accurate and useful information.

Overall, this review platform stands out for its clear insights, wide game coverage, and responsive support. I’d definitely recommend it to anyone looking for trustworthy and well-organized game reviews.

topicAiSummaryReviews.text:
Overall, Trustpilot is a fantastic platform that provides an excellent space for sharing honest reviews about other companies and services. It’s easy to use and helps consumers make informed decisions.

The only downsides so far are the support system - which doesn’t seem to respond to messages or suggestions - and the lack of an option to upload screenshots directly to reviews. Allowing image uploads would make reviews more legitimate and trustworthy by providing visual proof.

Hope to see these improvements soon!
topicAiSummaryReviews.title: Great platform with room for improvement

Overall, Trustpilot is a fantastic platform that provides an excellent space for sharing honest reviews about other companies and services. It’s easy to use and helps consumers make informed decisions.

The only downsides so far are the support system - which doesn’t seem to respond to messages or suggestions - and the lack of an option to upload screenshots directly to reviews. Allowing image uploads would make reviews more legitimate and trustworthy by providing visual proof.

Hope to see these improvements soon!

topicAiSummaryReviews.text:
I find Trust pilot a really valuable resource to check the legitimacy of businesses. A couple of observations though...I understand the system whereby they add a couple of mid range review scores to ensure a company's review is not unfairly skewed by a couple of initial bad reviews. However this does mean that small, respectable companies are effectively punished - I just reviewed a small business that had only 1 review ( of 5 stars) and yet Trustpilot's algorithm had given them a review score of 3.6.
Also I strongly suspect that some larger companies have bots set up allowing them to flood the site with positive reviews following the posting of a single negative one. I saw it myself after posting a critical review of a company and then watching as within literally minutes of my review being posted it was buried by more than a dozen generic sounding 5 star reviews . It would be good to know what Trustpilot are doing to ensure they can remain genuinely reflective of real experiences.
topicAiSummaryReviews.title: A valuable resource but with reservations

topicAiSummaryReviews.text:
I’ve had a really positive experience using this review platform. It’s easy to navigate, and everything is laid out clearly, which makes finding detailed information about different games simple and enjoyable.

What I really appreciate is how well the platform covers gameplay. The reviews give honest insights into how games actually feel to play, highlighting important features, performance, and overall entertainment value. It helps set realistic expectations before trying something new.

The game selection covered on the platform is also impressive. There’s a wide range of titles reviewed, from popular mainstream games to hidden gems. It feels comprehensive and up to date, which makes it a reliable source for discovering new options.

Customer support is another strong point. Whenever I had a question, the response was quick, friendly, and helpful. It’s clear that they care about their users and want to provide accurate and useful information.

Overall, this review platform stands out for its clear insights, wide game coverage, and responsive support. I’d definitely recommend it to anyone looking for trustworthy and well-organized game reviews.

The company was not delivering what they were advertising but saying they will only refund the purchase price less £25 refund fee, and any other fees required for the return to China, although the site suggests it is sent from the UK. What would be good is if TrustPilot could contact Trading Standards and Credit Card companies who supply  their services and notify them of the bad reviews. I guess there would have to be some sort of level that would need to be reached.

I was glad to be able to slow down and simplify the song. This really capture our  relationship and essence well.

aiSummary.summary:
Reviewers overwhelmingly had a great experience with this company. Customers consistently praise the positive user experience, finding the platform incredibly easy to use and genuinely helpful. The service provided is also highly regarded, with many appreciating its reliability and the active response of the team.

Consumers are very satisfied with the product, highlighting its clear features and overall amazing functionality. The staff also receives positive feedback, indicating that they are attentive and provide excellent support. People find the platform to be a valuable resource for making informed decisions.

topicAiSummaries.summary: Consumers generally express satisfaction with the user experience, highlighting its ease of use and clear navigation. Many reviewers appreciate how simple it is to find detailed information and write their own reviews, making the platform helpful for making informed decisions. However, some users have reported issues with the text area for writing reviews, noting difficulties with editing and selecting words.

Reviewers highlight ambiguous aspects of the website. Many customers find the website easy to use, comprehensive, and a reliable source for checking company legitimacy and discovering new options. However, some users express frustration with issues like hidden or offline reviews, difficulties with the review writing interface, and the mobile app. There are also concerns about the website's transparency and the potential for companies to manipulate review visibility.

Users describe positive interactions with service. Many customers appreciate the platform as a reliable first line of defense before trusting any service, highlighting its ease of use and helpfulness. Reviewers also praise specific instances of great service, with some mentioning smooth and efficient handling of their needs. However, some users express disappointment, citing unmet expectations and a need for improved service and support.

People report positive experiences with product, often using the platform to check reviews before making purchases. Many reviewers appreciate the wide range of titles covered, from popular games to hidden gems, and value the honest insights into how products actually feel to use. However, some customers express minor disappointments, such as a specific feature being stuck at an older version or preferring a substitute name for a product.

Reviewers mention positive feedback about staff. Customers consistently praise the team for their friendly, professional, and responsive service, highlighting a genuine focus on customer satisfaction. Many express gratitude, specifically mentioning individuals like Patsy and Claire for their great service and support.

sellingPoints.text: with a simple yet powerful idea that is more relevant today than ever — to be the universal symbol of trust, bringing consumers and businesses together through reviews. Trustpilot is open, independent, and impartial — we help consumers make the right choices and businesses to build trust, grow and improve.

Today, we have more than 300 million reviews and 67 million monthly active users across the globe, with 127 billion annual Trustpilot brand impressions, and the numbers keep growing. We have more than 900 employees and we're headquartered in Copenhagen, with operations in Amsterdam, Denver, Edinburgh, Hamburg, London, Melbourne, Milan and New York

translations.about-page/ceo/alt-text: A photograph of Peter Mühlmann – founder and CEO of Trustpilot – sitting in front of a window.
translations.about-page/ceo/quote-V2: “Our vision is to become a universal symbol of trust, empowering consumers to make confident, informed buying decisions while allowing businesses to credibly signal the quality of their services and to gain actionable insights to improve them.”
translations.about-page/ceo/quote-v3: “Our vision is to become the universal symbol of trust, empowering consumers to make confident, informed buying decisions while allowing businesses to credibly signal the quality of their services and to gain actionable insights to improve them.”
translations.about-page/head/metadescription: Hello, we are Trustpilot, Our mission is to bring people and companies together to create ever-improving experiences for everyone. Find out about our company history, products and more.
translations.about-page/head/metadescription-v2: Trustpilot began in 2007 with a simple yet powerful idea that is more relevant today than ever — to be the universal symbol of trust, bringing consumers and businesses together through reviews.
translations.about-page/trustbox/description: We aim to continuously improve, and every review helps us provide better experiences for everyone.
translations.about-page/trustbox/header: See what people are saying about Trustpilot
translations.about-page/trustpilot-description/part-1: Trustpilot was founded in 2007 with a vision to create a universal symbol of trust. We’re an independent, digital platform that brings businesses and consumers together to foster trust and inspire collaboration. We’re free to use, open to everybody, and built on transparency.
Trustpilot began in 2007 with a simple yet powerful idea that is more relevant today than ever — to be the universal symbol of trust, bringing consumers and businesses together through reviews.
translations.about-page/trustpilot-description/part-2: Trustpilot helps consumers shop with confidence and helps businesses build trust, grow and improve what they offer. The more consumers use our platform to share their experiences, the richer the insights we offer businesses, and the more opportunities they have to earn the trust of consumers from all around the world.
Trustpilot is open, independent, and impartial — we help consumers make the right choices and businesses to build trust, grow and improve.
translations.about-page/video/preview/alt-text: A preview of a video introducing Trustpilot.
translations.about-page/what-we-do/circle/label: We bring consumers and businesses together to make things better
translations.about-page/who-we-are/carousel/image/ceo: A photograph of Trustpilot CEO, Peter Holten Mühlmann, engaged in friendly conversation with a Trustpilot employee in Trustpilot's office.
translations.about-page/who-we-are/carousel/image/des: A photograph of two employees engaged in conversation in the midst of desks in Trustpilot's office.
translations.about-page/who-we-are/carousel/image/sun: A photograph of smiling Trustpilot employees collaborating in sunshine.
translations.about-page/who-we-are/description-v3: We have more than 900 employees and we’re headquartered in Copenhagen, with operations in Amsterdam, Denver, Edinburgh, Hamburg, London, Melbourne, Milan and New York.
translations.about-page/who-we-are/description-v4: We have more than [NUMBER] employees and we’re headquartered in Copenhagen, with operations in Amsterdam, Denver, Edinburgh, Hamburg, London, Melbourne, Milan and New York.
translations.about-page/who-we-are/header: We’re a passionate bunch of people from all around the world
translations.accept-terms-page/description: Please accept Trustpilot’s terms & conditions and privacy policy. Once you have accepted them you can use our services.
translations.accept-terms-page/checkbox-label: I accept the new [LINK-TC-BEGIN]Terms & Conditions[LINK-TC-END] and [LINK-PP-BEGIN]Privacy Policy[LINK-PP-END]
translations.accept-terms-page/accept-terms-and-agree: By continuing, you agree to Trustpilot’s [LINK-TERMS-BEGIN]Terms and Conditions[LINK-TERMS-END] and [LINK-PRIVACY-BEGIN]Privacy Policy[LINK-PRIVACY-END].
translations.authentication-modal/header: Log in or sign up on Trustpilot
translations.authentication-modal/force-login/header: Keep browsing with a free account
translations.cookie-consent/ccpa/title-v2: Do not sell or share my personal information
translations.cookie-consent/ccpa/body-1: Under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), you can opt out of Trustpilot selling your personal information to third parties by updating your cookie preferences.
translations.cookie-consent/ccpa/body-1-v2: Under U.S. state privacy laws, you have the right to opt out of Trustpilot sharing your personal information with third parties by updating your cookie preferences.
translations.cookie-consent/ccpa/body-2: Please note that if you opt out, we can’t offer you personalized ads.
translations.cookie-consent/ccpa/body-3: You can read more about your rights under the CCPA in our [LINK-BEGIN]privacy policy[LINK-END].
translations.cookie-consent/ccpa/body-3-v2: You can read more about your rights in our [LINK-BEGIN]privacy policy[LINK-END].
translations.upgrade-browser/community-heading: You're here because we don't support your browser
translations.upgrade-browser/community-body: You may need to update your browser. Download the latest version now:
translations.upgrade-browser/javascript-heading: You've landed here because the browser you’re using doesn’t support JavaScript
translations.upgrade-browser/javascript-body: To use Trustpilot, please activate JavaScript on your browser or download the latest version of your favorite browser now:
translations.chrome-extension-ad/text: See if a website is trustworthy without leaving the page
translations.consumer-verification/tooltip/body: This user has verified their identity with a photo ID. We encourage both companies and reviewers to get verified, to help ensure real people are writing reviews about real companies on Trustpilot. [LINK-BEGIN]Learn more[LINK-END]
translations.service-review-card/share/share-in-busin: Style your review with the Image Generator

translations.service-review-card/review-labels/merged: This review was previously shown on [COMPANY-URL]'s profile. It’s now shown here because the profiles were merged. [LINK-BEGIN]Read more[LINK-END]
translations.service-review-card/review-labels/invite: This reviewer was manually invited to write a review following their experience with the company. This [LINK-BEGIN]type of review[LINK-END] is automatically labeled [BOLD-BEGIN]invited[BOLD-END].

translations.service-review-card/review-labels/verifi: This reviewer was automatically invited to write a review following their experience with the company. This [LINK-BEGIN]type of review[LINK-END] is automatically labeled [BOLD-BEGIN]verified[BOLD-END].

translations.service-review-card/review-labels/redire: The reviewer left a review by clicking on a link on the company’s website which led to their public profile on Trustpilot. [LINK-BEGIN]Read more[LINK-END]
translations.service-review-card/banner/pending/body: It may take up to 2 hours to appear on Trustpilot. [LINK-BEGIN]Learn more[LINK-END]

Some reviews on our profile page may mistakenly be written about other companies. To ensure our profile reflects only genuine experiences with Trustpilot, we flag reviews that aren’t about us—whether they’re positive or negative. translations.business-unit-transparency-page/review-t: Trustpilot is an open review platform, so customers can take their own initiative to write reviews, without being asked by companies. Those are called [LINK-BEGIN]organic reviews[LINK-END].

Trustpilot is an open review platform, so people with a genuine experience can write [LINK-BEGIN]organic reviews[LINK-END] without being asked to by a company. These are written without using our supported invitation methods.

With Trustpilot's automated invitation services, reviewers are automatically invited to write a review following their experience with a company. This type of review is automatically labeled [LINK-BEGIN]verified[LINK-END].

With Trustpilot's manual invitation services, reviewers are manually invited by a company to write a review (with a direct link to Trustpilot’s review form). This type of review is automatically labeled [LINK-BEGIN]invited[LINK-END].
The reviewer left a review by clicking on a link on the company’s website which led to their public profile on Trustpilot. [LINK-BEGIN]Read more[LINK-END]

translations.user-data-page/intro/body: Personal data is any information that relates to an identifiable individual. Our [LINK-BEGIN]Privacy Policy[LINK-END] explains what personal data we collect from you, and how we collect, use, disclose, transfer, and store it.

translations.user-data-page/reviews/body: You can see your reviews [LINK-BEGIN-REVIEWS]here[LINK-END-REVIEWS]. You can change or delete your reviews at any time by following [LINK-BEGIN-SUPPORT]these steps[LINK-END-SUPPORT].

translations.user-data-page/download/body-v2: Download your personal profile information, including any service and product reviews you've written, in a standard file format (JSON):
translations.user-data-page/additional-info/body: We also collect additional analytics information relating to you as you use our services, which can’t be downloaded above. This may include your Trustpilot search history, time spent on our site, features or functions you’ve accessed, links you’ve clicked, and more. To obtain a complete set of all such data, email us at [LINK-BEGIN]privacy@trustpilot.com[LINK-END] with the subject line: “Access Request”.
translations.user-data-page/additional-info/body-v2: We also collect additional data on how you use Trustpilot—which can’t be downloaded above. This could include anything from your Trustpilot search history and time spent on our site, to features or functions you’ve accessed, links you’ve clicked, and more. To access this data, email [LINK-BEGIN]privacy@trustpilot.com[LINK-END] with the subject line ‘[SUBJECT-LINE-BEGIN]Data Subject Access Request[SUBJECT-LINE-END]’, and include a quick explanation of your request in the email body.
translations.user-data-page/additional-info/body-v3: For more information please refer to our Privacy Policy [LINK-BEGIN]here[LINK-END].
